arts.ttl: West Ham poised to land Portuguese hit-man with 205 G/A
arts.sum: After losing Niclas Fullkrug to injury West Ham’s need for a striker is acute, and to that end the East Londoners could look to RB Leipzig’s Andre Silva to help fire them to safety. arts.sum: West Ham have rejected a loan bid for star player who failed to impress under Lopetegui. arts.ttl: Great to pick up first West Ham win - Potter
arts.sum: Graham Potter says it feels "great" to pick up his first win as West Ham United head coach, though he admits the victory against Fulham was "stressful" at times.

arts.ttl: West Ham edge five-goal thriller against Fulham to give Potter first win
arts.sum: Graham Potter won his first Premier League match in charge of West Ham United as they overcame Fulham 3-2 in an entertaining affair on Tuesday. Potter's first Premier League match in charge West Ham produced three points, providing some overdue positivity at the London Stadium.

arts.ttl: “Viable proposition” | West Ham could still pull off unbelievable signing
arts.sum: West Ham could still sign Marcus Rashford on loan but Manchester United would rather he moved elsewhere. The idea of West Ham being direct competition to Manchester United a matter of years ago would have been unthinkable. arts.ttl: Silva laments Fulham errors after unbeaten run ends
arts.sum: Marco Silva admitted Fulham only had themselves to blame after their nine-match unbeaten run ended at West Ham. They lost 3-2 at the London Stadium, where they were on top in the first half only to concede two goals in quick succession. arts.ttl: Former Arsenal and Chelsea star Willian attracting interest from Premier League clubs after terminating his contract with Olympiacos
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: Former Arsenal and Chelsea winger Willian could be set for a sensational return to the Premier League . The 36-year-old's last stint in the English top flight came at Fulham .

arts.ttl: Graham Potter makes West Ham admission despite 'absolutely top' first win and delivers transfer update
arts.sum: Hammers emerged victorious in an entertaining London derby on Tuesday night
